title: NXP JCOP on SN100.C25 Secure Element
table_of_content: Usage and Major Security Features of the TOE
Security Objectives for the Operational Environment
Definition of Family ”Generation of random numbers (FCS_RNG)”
Security Requirements Rationale for the TOE
Protection against Interference and Logical Tampering
Protection against Bypass of Security Related Actions

revisions.description: Product Maintenance for JCOP 5.0 on SN100
Corrected a typo in the references
